Contributing¶

Thank you for wanting to contribute to this library! We will try to make this an easy process for you.

If you find errors in the codebase:

  1. Submit an issue at the AirNet-SNL issues page

If you would like to contribute:

  1. Create a pull request (PR) or help with other PRs which are in the library by referencing AirNet-SNL PR page. Pull requests should contain code that follows the PEP8 python code style.

If you are confused:

  1. Feel free to reach out to the package maintainer, as found in setup.py.
